skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: {"id": "8334a20c-8545-4933-bd9a-ad09613e1033", "value": "Appropriate for all assets, as judged against local characteristics."}

{"id": "e9fc7c69-3db6-4bec-81ff-fa2393fddea5", "value": "The age of an asset may be an important criterion, and the age range can be adjusted to take into account distinctive local characteristics or building traditions."}

{"id": "d4879cc3-433f-4a9b-a8ab-1e8dbd203224", "value": "Although local heritage lists have long been developed successfully for buildings, all\nheritage asset types, including monuments, sites, places, areas, parks, gardens and\ndesigned landscapes may be considered for inclusion."}

{"id": "587c850b-c309-45d9-9343-9f15281b0298", "value": "The intrinsic design and aesthetic value of an asset relating to local and/or national\nstyles, materials, construction and craft techniques, or any other distinctive\ncharacteristics."}
{"id": "1fbd2065-f93a-4ada-8fa8-737920a51d4f", "value": "Groupings of assets with a clear visual design or historic relationship."}

{"id": "c611dbae-9cfc-4a83-8dd6-0db84a64878a", "value": "An asset with strong communal or historical associations, or because it has especially\nstriking aesthetic value, may be singled out as a landmark within the local scene."}

{"id": "35a1ccf1-eb86-4acd-a18e-3f3f03701576", "value": "A significant historical association of local or national note, including links to important
local figures, may enhance the significance of a heritage asset. Blue Plaque and
similar schemes may be relevant. Social and communal interest may be regarded
as a sub-set of historic interest but has special value in local listing. As noted in the
PPG: ‘Heritage assets … can also provide meaning for communities derived from their
collective experience of a place and can symbolise wider values such as faith and
cultural identity’. It therefore relates to places perceived as a source of local identity,
distinctiveness, social interaction and coherence, contributing to the ‘collective
memory’ of a place."}

{"id": "b9125875-4302-4ae9-9ede-be0aae5bdd68", "value": "The local heritage asset may provide evidence about past human activity in the\nlocality, which may be in the form of buried remains, but may also be revealed in the structure of buildings or in a designed landscape, for instance. Heritage assets with archaeological interest are primary sources of evidence about the substance and evolution of places, and of the people and cultures that made them."}
